result.title: Guidelines for inter laboratory comparisons (ILC) for validation of harmonized SOPs
result.description: The aim of this deliverable is to describe activities to ensure harmonisation of key inhouse SOPs in WP14 via conducting and evaluating interlaboratory comparisons according to international evaluation standards Therefore specific support during the design definition of measurands calibrations and traceability of measurements and data evaluation of the inter laboratory comparisons will be provided A default approach for ILCs will be developed and the application throughout the project wherever feasible will be ensured This common approach will harmonise the validation of the various methods in work packages 14 Potential method candidates for inter laboratory validation will be determined at Month 12 based on GoNoGo decisions made in WPs 13

result.title: Final report on the interaction with standardization system
result.description: This deliverable is the final result of the activities of Task 7.1.Standarization, with the objective of facilitate through standardization the acceptance and utilization by the market of the developed solution. The deliverable will resume the activities and feedback collected from the interaction with the standardization technical committees (TCs) related with the project in order to improve the development and the exploitation strategy of the project, checking the feasibility and guide the characteristics of a future standardization of the project results.

result.title: D53.1a - Integration Plan into Copernicus Service Architecture (Issue 1)
result.description: This report constituts the project’s suggested Integration Plan into Copernicus Service Architecture. A detailed description of the objectives will be provided together with an explanation of the findings and conclusions as derived by WP 53. It will comprehensively provide the project’s findings in view of timing and infrastructure requirements for inclusion of the identified improved and new candidate services and products into the Copernicus Service infrastructure.

result.title: Future standardization proposals
result.description: This deliverable is the result of the activities of Task 7.1.Standarization, with the objective of facilitate through standardization the acceptance and utilization by the market of the developed solution. The deliverable will summarize the outcomes of the project into future new or revised standards so they can be easily found and used by the European or international industry sector and will present a list of specific standardization proposals. These proposals will fit the standardization procedures and requirements to be ready for inclusion in the development of future new standards or into revised ones.

result.title: Second year report on Network of Stakeholders & Dissemination Activities
result.description: Packages of prepared course materials will be available for use within classrooms across Europe in order for teachers to use our tools and techniques within their classrooms to promote the changing of students energy usage behaviors. We will also monitor the activity and usage of these materials not only for our project partners, but also other institutions as well as promote the establishment of a long-lasting group of entities that are interested in these goals.
